body_html:
yes, I am ok with it.
On Jun 7, 2016 12:12 AM, "Carsten Zimmermann" notifications@github.com
wrote:

Hey @sonianand11 https://github.com/sonianand11 – sorry for the long
wait and again, thanks for your PR. I've just pushed 1ec0cac
1ec0cac
which solves the problem behind this PR by fixing the offending migrations.
I'm closing this PR in favor of that commit since it's less "invasive". I
hope you're ok with this.

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
